text: Secret Agents is a 2004 French crime film directed by Frédéric Schoendoerffer. == Cast == * Vincent Cassel - Brisseau * Monica Bellucci - Barbara / Lisa * André Dussollier - Colonel Grasset * Charles Berling - Eugène * Bruno Todeschini - Homme maigre en civil * Sergio Peris-Mencheta - Raymond ==References== == External links == * Category:2000s spy films Category:French spy films Category:French films
title: Secret Agents (film)
